text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: You want me to participate in a press conference…?

I heard from Tazuna that they are being flooded 
with requests to interview you.

I heard from Tazuna that they are being flooded 
with requests to interview you.

After all, you're most likely to win in the Fall Tenno Sho. 
Everyone's got their eyes on you.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Seems so, doesn't it…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
What's wrong? If you don't wanna be interviewed 
I can just answer for you, ya know?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
I've just gotta say “I'm on a diet right now so I 
have to refrain from eating my favorite cake.”

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: You saw me worrying in front of the cake shop!?

I never put any dietary restrictions on 
her… I wonder if they're voluntary…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: No, carelessness will lead to unexpected consequences.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Anyways, I will accept the interview requests.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
You are currently favored to win the Fall Tenno 
Sho. Are you confident that you will win?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Of course I am confident, however, anything could happen. 
Therefore, I am approaching this race with cautious optimism.

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text:
There will be many powerhouses in this upcoming 
race. How do you plan on defeating them?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: That…

Wondering if she should tell the reporters, 
Mejiro McQueen looked to me.

As you can imagine, I cannot give you a detailed 
explanation of our strategy.

That being said, it would be great if 
our bracket was on the inside.

text_block_list.name: Reporter C
text_block_list.text:
By the way, I have heard that at one point Mejiro 
McQueen was the only member of your team.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
That is true. However, we have recruited more members and are 
finally getting back on track…

text_block_list.name: Reporter C
text_block_list.text: Was this because of your victory in the Spring Tenno Sho?

Mejiro McQueen seemed at a loss for words, 
so she looked to me again.

Despite the fact that our team was on the verge of collapse, 
Mejiro McQueen managed to win the Spring Tenno Sho, paving the 
way for more members to join our team.

Because of that, McQueen really is 
the heart/backbone of our team.

text_block_list.name: Reporter C
text_block_list.text: I see. McQueen-san, everyone is expecting great things from you!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Eh? Ahh, umm… That is true/They sure are.

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text: Now then, do you have a message for your fans?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I am truly honored that you all have rated 
me as the most likely to win.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
In order to meet everyone's expectations, I will continue to 
train as hard as possible until the day of the race.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Eww, so serious! You were way too serious! It 
was such a boring, normal press conference!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I answered the questions as I normally 
would. What did you expect?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
text_block_list.text: But every response you had was so cool!

text_block_list.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: McQueen-san, I'm so excited for your next race!

Mejiro McQueen has managed to not only excite her fans, but also 
excite every one of her team members as well.

She really is the heart/backbone of our team, 
and a truly reliable one at that.
Alright everyone! Let's go get ourselves some delicious food!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Wooah! Really!? Awesome, let's go have some all-you-can-eat 
Ise Ebi/Japanese spiny lobsters!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
text_block_list.text:
I've always wanted to visit a candy store 
famous for its carrot sweets!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Black Bob-cut
text_block_list.text:
Jeez, since McQueen-chan is the star, why 
don't we go wherever she wants to?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Umm… I'll pass…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I spent all day at the press conference after 
all. I would like to do some training now.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Doing training after all that? Oye, are you okay? Don't you think 
you've been training a little too hard?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Of course I've been making sure I don't overexert myself. 
Especially after collapsing before.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
However, I wouldn't want to lose all of that momentum 
now that everything is going well.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Is that okay with you, Trainer-san?
choice_data_list: I'll leave it for you to decide what's best.
I'll leave it for you to decide what's best.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Thank you. Now then, I'm heading out.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: She's as serious as ever, huh…?

And then came the Fall Tenno Sho, the huge stage that brought a 
lot of attention to Mejiro McQueen.
Jeez, the stands are packed. That sure is a lot of people.
Jeez, the stands are packed. That sure is a lot of people.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
And you know what that means, right!? “Golshi Yakisoba” is gonna 
sell like hot cakes! I better hurry and get it ready!
Don't do that, we've got to cheer on McQueen. Wait, where is she?
Don't do that, we've got to cheer on McQueen. Wait, where is she?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: She already left ya know?

Eh…? It's nowhere near time to start… 
Why did she leave so early?

Eh…? It's nowhere near time to start… 
Why did she leave so early?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Woo…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
The expectations of a member of the Mejiro Family, the 
expectations of the fans that have supported me…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
The expectations of the team members that have relied 
on me, and Trainer-san's expectations…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Everyone, I'm going to win this for you…
